page.title: 01The Spennymoor Area.
page.content: Walk in the{countryside}and see beautiful coloured flowers trees with bright green leaves, amphibians, birds, insects,bats,rats and foxes.You may see deer on the{Shafto Estate. In the town{vandalism}is a problem.It makes our town dirty and unpleasant to see. The tall towered{Town Hall}in the centre used to be council office but now is only used for entertainment.The most important{industries}are the manufacture of power tools and electrical appliances.The indoor {market}is made up of permanent stalls which sell a range of goods from fruit to computers. In July our{gala}is held.People line the streets to watch a procession of floats and Jazz-bands, marching to the park where stalls and shows are set up.{Buses}take you from Spennymoor,Darlington and Bishop Auckland.
